text: Yara tomadera dharmamate calabe, tadera chara ara ka'uke bisbasa karabe na. Bale dina nihsandehe hedayeta seta'i, ye hedayeta allaha karena. Ara esaba kichu e jan'ye ye, tomara ya labha karechile ta an'ya ke'u kena prapta habe, kimba tomadera palanakartara samane tomadera upara tara kena prabala haye yabe! Bale dina, maryada allahara'i hate; tini yake iccha dana karena ebam allaha pracuryamaya o sarbajna.
